title: Meet Pico.
description:
The new Pico beer brewing appliance helps you brew craft beer right at home with just a push of a button. Choose any PicoPak recipe from a large variety of craft breweries worldwide including: 21st Amendment, Rogue Ales, Abita, and Flying Monkeys. Brewing takes approximately 2 hours depending on recipe and up to 10 days to ferment. 5 liter portable Serving Kegs make you the star of every party when you stroll in the door! 

Pre-orders available now for shipment in October.
